strings.Value: "Your 'dream'? You are talking about Nyrissa, right?"
"Nyrissa manipulated you. Accept it and rest in peace, shadow."
[Attack] "You are a stranger in this world. I've killed you before, I'll kill you now!"
"You do realize you've been dead for a long time?"

{n}A tall figure in a horned helmet, towering behind the bandits' backs, walks slowly toward you. {/n} "If it isn't my greatest mistake." {n}The Stag Lord rolls his eyes madly.{/n} "I was sitting in my fortress and drinking. When I should have come here and burned the damn {g|Oleg's Trading Post}trading post{/g} to the ground, along with everyone inside â€” on the very day you appeared in the {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g}."
"You killed her, right? My dream..." {n}You hear sincere grief in the shadow's voice.{/n}
"She chose you, right? My dream..." {n}You hear dull melancholy in the shadow's voice.{/n}
"You spared her life, right? My dream... I doubt she even remembers me, but yet..."
"Nyrissa..." {n}The bandit's crude speech changes imperceptibly.{/n} "I didn't even know her name. She'd come to me in dreams, and I only knew her as my dream..."
"Dead? So what? I have my memories, I have my gang, I have two hands to draw a bow. Nothing is stopping me from conquering these lands, as I've done before."

"She did. So what? You can't imagine what I was before she came to me. She gave me purpose. She awakened me. I cast aside the pathetic scumbag I used to call my father, I gathered my people, I cut the throats of a dozen other chiefs, and brought these lands to heel. I wanted to call her my queen..."
"My dream that never came true. I'm glad I've returned to life, so now I can get revenge on her murderer. Prepare to die a long and painful death, scum!"
{n}The Stag Lord shakes his head, as if banishing a thought.{/n} "My dream that never came true. So what? I didn't get my queen, but at least I'll get my crown. I'll tear it from your head!"
